room_title: Escape room "Lost Treasure" by Behind Locked Doors in Taylorville
room_address: 115 South Clay Street, Suite A â€‹Taylorville, IL 62568
room_description:
Ahoy, Mates! Pirate James Forget here. It seems I've forgotten where I placed my treasures and I need your help finding it. Aboard my ship, the Trapped Diamond, but you must be warned, once you've boarded, there is no going back until you've secured my treasure.
You have only an hour to locate my precious jewels and coins before the great Athena hurricane hits the coast and takes my ship to the bottom of the ocean. Can you escape with your life and the lost treasure?
